author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
From yonder Holland, 'twas birthed, a term so grand,
Boss, though humble, its reach did expand.
To politics, to roguery, to the redacted verse,
In Springsteen's name, its fame did burst.

In Jersey Shore's sandy embrace did he dwell,
Springsteen, our bard, his tale I foretell.
At seventy-four, he rocks the celestial dome,
Yet, my heart yearns for him, the scruff-clad beach gnome.

From India's heart, echoes a conflict old,
Between the Sikhs, and Modi's fold.
In the wake of a martyr, the plea arose,
For a homeland, a haven, to quell the woes.

feedItems.title: 'Boss': From a Head Honcho in Dutch to a Rock Star in the U.S.A.
feedItems.description: The term jumped to English during colonial times, then spread to politics and criminal gangs and eventually to Bruce Springsteen.

feedItems.title: The Glory Days of Bruce Springsteen, and Me
feedItems.description: As the megastar turns 74, still rocking arenas, I miss the scruffy Jersey Shore beach rat I wanted to be.

feedItems.title: India's Clash With Canada Follows New Wave of Calls for Sikh Homeland
feedItems.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi aired security concerns to Western leaders in the months before the killing of a Canadian Sikh activist.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
O'er divisive games, the nation rues,
Their minds distracted from the Trues,
Partisan wrestle, fresh conflict ignite,
Seek not we now, another impeachment fight.

Strikes besiege the humble carmaker's dwell,
Escalating in a negotiation's swell,
From whence the common man's plight's addressed,
Clues five may show where unrest unrests.

Fields once nourished by demiurge's hand,
In Russia's sway, now pivotal stand,
Near a southeast village, forests and plains,
Become the theater of Ukraine's counteroffensive gains.

feedItems.title: Americans Don't Want Another Impeachment Fight
feedItems.description: Voters say partisan battles are distracting lawmakers from fixing the country’s problems.

feedItems.title: Five Clues to Where the UAW Strike Is Headed Next
feedItems.description: Carmakers face an escalating fight. Here’s what to watch for in the negotiations.

feedItems.title: Fields Fortified by Russia Become Pivotal to Ukraine's Counteroffensive
feedItems.description: The most important fighting in Ukraine right now is taking place in a few fields and tree lines near a southeastern agricultural village.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Evergrande, a giant of moon-silver stone,
Aborteth now, a debt plan once well-known.
Just like a drunk who findeth not the way home,
Their coffers dry, they tip the beggar's cone.

Stock indexes, those dancers in our fair game,
Show weariness, as Friday tolls the claim.
Ales sour, wines clink, as fortunes fade in name,
Three weekly losses, markets play in shame.

Warner, of fame, and Discovery's bright crest,
In Watford confines, worketh to their best.
DC's hub, a peacock in bright plumage dressed,
Its studios, a lively, thriving nest.

feedItems.title: China Evergrande is scrapping a $35 billion debt-restructuring plan designed to ensure the property developer's survival.
feedItems.description: China Evergrande is scrapping a $35 billion debt-restructuring plan designed to ensure the property developer’s survival.

feedItems.title: U.S. stock indexes edged lower Friday. The S&P 500 fell 0.2%, notching its third straight weekly loss. The Nasdaq and Dow lost 0.1% and 0.3%, respectively.
feedItems.description: U.S. stock indexes edged lower Friday. The S&P 500 fell 0.2%, notching its third straight weekly loss. The Nasdaq and Dow lost 0.1% and 0.3%, respectively.

feedItems.title: Warner Bros. Discovery is expanding its film studios in Watford, northwest of London, into the primary production hub for DC Studios.
feedItems.description: Warner Bros. Discovery is expanding its film studios in Watford, northwest of London, into the primary production hub for DC Studios.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Upon the realm of fiefdoms bound by web and code,
A pact 'twixt giants quelled the fear of antitrust's broad sword.
When Microsoft and Activision, by the U.K. side,
Did find a common footing where their ambitions they'd abide.

Biden, our noble chieftain, to Zelensky lends his aid,
Offers long-range missiles as in strife they wade.
The sea of conflict roars, yet in their courage, they shall bide,
Bolstered by the promise of an ally by their side.

Behold! The roar of labour, echoing through the night!
Workers down the hammer, in bitter fight they unite.
Yet in the heart of industry, where Stellantis and GM stall,
Echoes a plea for justice, a fair share for them all.

feedItems.title: U.K. authorities said in a preliminary decision that Microsoft's modified deal for Activision had resolved most of its antitrust concerns.
feedItems.description: U.K. authorities said in a preliminary decision that Microsoft’s modified deal for Activision had resolved most of its antitrust concerns.

feedItems.title: President Biden has told Zelensky that the U.S. is willing to provide advanced long-range, surface-to-surface missiles to help Kyiv with its counteroffensive.
feedItems.description: President Biden has told Zelensky that the U.S. is willing to provide advanced long-range, surface-to-surface missiles to help Kyiv with its counteroffensive.

feedItems.title: UAW sent another 5,600 members out on strike at GM and Stellantis, extending the work stoppage to parts-distribution centers that supply dealerships.
feedItems.description: UAW sent another 5,600 members out on strike at GM and Stellantis, extending the work stoppage to parts-distribution centers that supply dealerships.
